ANU.name: Rajeev Kumar
interest: Psychiatric aspects of medical conditions  Psychiatric aspects of neurological disorders (e.g. MS, PD, HD, Epilepsy, Stroke,  etc)Functional neurological disorders Mild cognitive impairment and dementiaNeuroimaging related to neuropsychiatric disorders
project: 1. Personality and Total Health (PATH) Through Life 60+ Longitudinal Study at the ANU - clinical collaborator (current)
2. Successful Aging: A Multiethnic Asian Study (past)
A large cross-sectional study conducted in Singapore, aimed at determining the bio-psycho-social correlates of productive aging.
Co-PIs: Kua Ee Heok, Ng Tze pin, Dilip V Jeste
